name: Epilogues
description:
A simple task: explore, collect, take notes.

But… What is this place? What hides behind those endless walls? What is the real purpose of this job? 

Epilogues is a atmospheric horror game with retro visuals. Explore a mysterious maze with a design inspired by the classic 1-bit Macintosh games and the phenomenal Return of the Obra Dinn. 

A short game, made in Brazil, developed in 14 days for My First Game Jam: Winter 2023.

Created and developed by Pedro Schimidt.

It may have bugs. Feedback is appreciated.
